title: Step 7: Creating a basic application
content:
In XWiki, you can leverage the structured data management system to make collaborative web apps in a few minutes.

Start by clicking on "More applications" from the "Applications" panel and then click on "Create your own!". This will take you to the [App Within Minutes](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/App%20Within%20Minutes%20Application) home page.

Click on the "Create Application" button to start the wizard.

[![AWM.png](/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingABasicApp/AWM.png?width=960&rev=1.1)](/xwiki/bin/download/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/CreatingABasicApp/AWM.png?rev=1.1)

In just four steps you’ll be able to build your own app without writing a line of code. You can find out more about “App Within Minutes” by reading the [documentation page](https://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/App%20Within%20Minutes%20Application) or trying the [Contact Manager Application tutorial](/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/DevGuide/Tutorials/Creating%20A%20Contact%20Manager%20Application/).

**Next [Tips for going further](/xwiki/bin/view/Documentation/UserGuide/GettingStarted/GoingFurther)**
